'''George''' is the father of [[Patty (Acceptance)|Patty]].

==History==
George's wife, Laurie, abandoned their daughter, Patty, at the practice before she was meant to have surgery to reconstruct her knee after a car accident. Cooper was able to track them down at Laurie's sister's house and he tried to convince them to come back and be there for Patty, but they said the bills kept piling up and they couldn't handle it anymore. He told them they didn't deserve Patty and left.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Laurie]].

===Familial===
He and his wife abandoned their daughter because her medical care after a car accident was too expensive.
